review: I was excited to receive my Fire TV, being a huge fan of Amazon's Prime Instant Video. Mine came unregistered, so after a few minutes' frustration trying to sign in, I went to help chat...a very pleasant tech had me up and running in no time at all.I am rarely sitting in one place, even on my laziest days. I love being able to start a show on my big TV, pause it while I go into the kitchen, the pick it up on my Fire HD.Good job, Amazon!
author: R. Acoya

review: It's really awesome! Besides the quality n Vevo (which for some reason is blurry), this device is amazing. Though I have Roku and X-Box, I use this device over all of them because of the easiness and usefulness of it. It also has beautiful picture!
